name: Darklord is Dead
description: JRPG game with a modern touch and twist to the classic turn base combat system and city building elements. Emphasizing on player adventurer’s party customization and characters collection, without microtransaction practices. Player will strive to upgrade and customize their own city and party of adventurers in this beautifully drawn fantasy world where the Darklord that once terrorized the world was defeated. Without one unifying reason to defeat the Darklord, various factions and races in this world once again plunge into an era of war. Rise to power and unite the world once again!
